divs: Sighting DetailsI stopped while on the way to work to take some photos from a hilltop just outside Boulder Colorado. The photo was taken looking North West over the city. When I observed the photo I thought I might have moved the camera but realized the streak is the object moving at high speed. I had the Nikon S630 rested on top of the car so as to avoid any camera shake. The object is perfectly round some miles from me but I don't know how far away. Just for reference, the moon was in the southern sky and only a small slice.
Summary: Taking Photos of Early Morning Sky Found a Round Object in Photo
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Boulder
There were no other sightings in Boulder on or around May 19th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
